Jarry의 개발일기

    • Jarry의 개발 일기
    • 백준알고리즘
    • python 유용한 메소드
    • 장고에서 CPU, RAM, Disk Usage 를 Json으로 응답해오자
    • Django Rest Framework
    • Nodejs
    • 장고를 위한 파이썬 기본
    • 사용자 요구사항 정의
    • BookMark
    • 필수 설치 개발 프로그램
    • 소프트웨어 기획 단계
    • 커리어
    • HTML
    • css
    • Bable
    • eslint
    • HTML Tag: Full Name
    • NPM
    • Vue-chartjs에 대해 알아보자.
    • Vue
    • vuejs 프로젝트 구성 방법
    • Vuepress 이거 하나면 끝
    • Webpack에 대해 알아보자

# argon_dashboard

# 1. backend - django restapi 개발

  1. django rest framework 초기 셋팅을 해준다.
django-admin startproject config .
python manage.py startapp api
python manage.py startapp model 
python manage.py migrate
python manage.py createsuperuser

  1. api app

    urls.py

    from django.urls import path

from api import views

app_name = 'api'
urlpatterns = [
    path('post/list/', views.ApiPostLV.as_view(), name='post_list'),
    path('post/<int:pk>/', views.ApiPostDV.as_view(), name='post_detail'),
]
    1
    2
    3
    4
    5

    8
    9
    10

    views.py

    from django.http import JsonResponse
from django.views.generic.detail import BaseDetailView
from django.views.generic.list import BaseListView

from api.views_util import obj_to_post
from model.models import Verification


class ApiPostLV(BaseListView):
    model = Verification

    # noinspection PyMethodMayBeStatic
    def render_to_response(self, context, **response_kwargs):
        qs = context['object_list']
        postList = [obj_to_post(obj) for obj in qs]
        return JsonResponse(data=postList, safe=False, status=200)


class ApiPostDV(BaseDetailView):
    model = Verification

    # noinspection PyMethodMayBeStatic
    def render_to_response(self, context, **response_kwargs):
        obj = context['object']
        post = obj_to_post(obj)
        return JsonResponse(data=post, safe=True, status=200)
    1

    views_util.py

    def obj_to_post(obj):
    # obj 객체 -> dict 로 변환
    post = dict(vars(obj))

    # convert to string
    if obj.modify_dt:
        post['modify_dt'] = obj.modify_dt.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')
    else:
        post['modify_dt'] = ''

    if obj.owner:
        post['owner'] = obj.owner.username
    else:
        post['owner'] = 'Anonymous'

    del post['_state']

    return post
    1

  3. model app

    admin.py

    from django.contrib import admin

from model.models import Verification

@admin.register(Verification)
class PostAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ('id', 'title', 'modify_dt')
    1
    2
    3
    4
    5
    6
    7

    models.py

    from django.contrib.auth import get_user_model
from django.db import models


class Verification(models.Model):
    title = models.CharField(verbose_name='TITLE', max_length=50)
    description = models.CharField('DESCRIPTION', max_length=100, blank=True, help_text='simple description text.')
    value = models.IntegerField('VAULE')
    create_dt = models.DateTimeField('CREATE DATE', auto_now_add=True)
    modify_dt = models.DateTimeField('MODIFY DATE', auto_now=True)
    owner = models.ForeignKey(get_user_model(), on_delete=models.CASCADE, verbose_name='OWNER', blank=True, null=True)

    def __str__(self):
        return self.title
    1

# 1-2. django rest framework

  • 공부하다보니 위 방법은 django의 rest framework를 사용한 것이 아닌 ccbv 사이트를 이용한 방법임을 알게되었다.
  • rest framework를 쓰면 get, post가 더 직관적으로 나타나기 때문에 이 방법으로 다시 진행해본다.
django-admin startproject config .
python manage.py startapp api 
python manage.py migrate
python manage.py createsuperuser
1
2
3
4

# Config App

# config.settings.py
INSTALLED_APPS = [
    'rest_framework',
    'api',
]
TIME_ZONE = 'Asia/Seoul'

# config.urls.py
from django.contrib import admin
from django.urls import path, include

urlpatterns = [
    path('admin/', admin.site.urls),
    path('api/', include('api.urls')),
]

# API App

# admin.py
from django.contrib import admin
from .models import Quiz
admin.site.register(Quiz)

# models.py
from django.db import models

class Quiz(models.Model):
    title = models.CharField(max_length=144)
    body = models.TextField()
    answer = models.IntegerField()

# serializers.py
from rest_framework import serializers
from .models import Quiz
class QuizSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    class Meta:
        model = Quiz
        fields = ('title', 'body', 'answer')

# urls.py
from django.urls import path
from .views import totalQuiz
from .views import randomQuiz
urlpatterns = [
    path('/', totalQuiz),
    path('<int:id>/', randomQuiz)
]

# views.py
from rest_framework.response import Response
from rest_framework.decorators import api_view
from .models import Quiz
from .serializers import QuizSerializer
import random

@api_view(['GET'])
def totalQuiz(request):
    totalQuizs = Quiz.objects.all()
    serializer = QuizSerializer(totalQuizs, many=True)
    return Response(serializer.data)

@api_view(['GET'])
def randomQuiz(request, id):	 # id가 url의 인자로 들어옴
    totalQuizs = Quiz.objects.all()
    randomQuizs = random.sample(list(totalQuizs),id)
    serializer = QuizSerializer(randomQuizs, many=True)
    return Response(serializer.data)

# 2. Vue.js 작업

argon_dashboard를 수정하여 작업한다.

vue.config.js

module.exports = {
  devServer: {
    proxy: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000',    // xhr only
  },    
};
1
2
3
4
5

Dashboard.vue

import axios from "axios";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      post: {}
    };
  },
  methods: {
    fetchPostList() {
      console.log("fetchPostList()...", this.tagname);
    
      var getUrl = "/api/post/list/";
      axios.get(getUrl)
        .then((res) => {
          console.log("POST LIST GET RES", res);
          this.posts = res.data;
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          console.log("POST LIST GET ERR.RESPONSE", err.response);
          alert(err.response.status + " " + err.response.statusText);
        });
    },    
    fetchPostDetail(postId) {
      console.log("fetchPostDetail()...", postId);
      axios
        .get(`/api/post/${postId}/`)
        .then((res) => {
          console.log("POST DETAIL GET RES", res);
          this.post = res.data;
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          console.log("POST DETAIL GET ERR.RESPONSE", err.response);
          alert(err.response.status + " " + err.response.statusText);
        });
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchPostList()
    const postId = 2;
    this.fetchPostDetail(postId);
  },
};

# - 결과: 잘 작동한다.

물론 화면상 반영은 작업을 하지 않았다.

Rest Api로 데이터 Request 받기 완료.

Webpack에 대해 알아보자 VueDjangoProject
